mapper.update: update t_collect_website set name = #{name,jdbcType=BIGINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.url as t_url, t.icon as t_icon, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_collect_website t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.url as t_url, t.icon as t_icon, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_collect_website t
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.url as t_url, t.icon as t_icon, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_collect_website t
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.url as t_url, t.icon as t_icon, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_collect_website t
select count(1) as totalNum ,sum(t.name as t_name) from t_collect_website t
mapper.insert: insert into t_collect_website (id, name, url, icon, create_time, modify_time) values #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
